Package com.cafean.client.ui.util

Class VisualGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.client.ui.util.VisualGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Groupable, javax.swing.undo.StateEditable
    public class VisualGroup
extends java.lang.Object
implements Groupable, javax.swing.undo.StateEditable
    An object representing a group of visual objects inside a BeanBox. VisualGroups have an ident and an "old ident." These are used identically to the ident and DB_ID fields of AbstractComponents with the exception that the ident pool is allocated by each BeanBox.
    See Also:
    BeanBox.reconnectGroupIDs(), BeanBox.findGroupByIdent(int), BeanBox.findGroupByOldIdent(int)

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void addChildBounds​(VisualGroup group, VisualGroup[] groups, java.util.Hashtable groupBounds, BeanBox beanBox)
      Adds the bounding Rectangles stored for child groups (in groupBounds) to the parent groups' Rectangles.
      static void addSelectedBounds​(java.util.Hashtable groupBounds, BeanBox beanBox, int dx, int dy)

        public int getOldIdent()
        Retrieves this group's old ID number. This number is used in BeanBox.reconnectGroupIDs() when reconnecting Groupable components.

      • isGroupIDValid

        public boolean isGroupIDValid()
        Returns true if this object's visual group ID is valid. Valid visual group IDs are not reconnected during a paste operation.

        public static java.awt.Component[] getGroupedSelection​(java.awt.Component[] selected,
                                                       BeanBox box)
        Returns the complete selectedSet of components that should be selected given the current selectedSet of selected components. The returned selectedSet does not include any partially selected groups.
